remarks: The predicate "is a non-unital ring."  (Contributed by AV, 6-Jan-2020.)
statement:
isrng.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
isrng.g $e |- G = ( mulGrp ` R ) $.
isrng.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
isrng.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
isrng $p |- ( R e. Rng <-> ( R e. Abel /\ G e. SGrp /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B A. z e. B ( ( x .x. ( y .+ z ) ) = ( ( x .x. y ) .+ ( x .x. z ) ) /\ ( ( x .+ y ) .x. z ) = ( ( x .x. z ) .+ ( y .x. z ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x y z $.
$d .x. x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
